Job Title: UI/UX Designer (Jr.)

Location: Richmond, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Design, Marketing

Description:
TECHEAD is celebrating over thirty-five years of incredible heritage, talent, and accomplishments! To learn more about TECHEAD, visit us at TECHEAD.com or on Glassdoor. 
UI/UX Designer | #20309Hybrid | 12 months, Contract-To-HireOPEN ONLY TO US RESIDENTS with legal work authorization High preference for residents of Richmond or Lynchburg, VA
NO C2C / Sponsorship will not be given
Techead has partnered with a large financial services firm to help them hire a junior-level UI/UX Designer.
Ideal candidates will possess a strong drive towards user experience best practices and an eye for aesthetic details to systematically design the first market facing product of a new aging care experience.
Responsibilities:• Craft innovative, elegant, and useable digital interfaces (multi-platform) that support user needs and business goals• Illustrate design ideas using sketches, storyboards, process flows, sitemaps, and wireframes• Work with product owners, partners, and engineering throughout the process, from ideation to ramping, to ensure a refined product deliverable• Create robust design systems and interaction paradigms that support user needs and goals• Design to stakeholders and product owners• Engage in user testing and design research to help gather insights that inspire future evolutions of the product
Top Requirements: Must Haves• Experience with design research / user testing• 2-4 years strong user experience design (digital) portfolio• Figma expertise – components, auto layouts, prototypes, style guides, etc.• Possess a sensibility for clear and elegant typography and an instinct for motion design• creating design systems, and are energized to create an effective and sharp product• Strong communication skills to translate your ideas—through your designs, to end users and team members• In depth attention to detail of pixel perfection and find joy in minding the details• Self-starter inspired by collaboration with your team• Passionate about designing in the care and health sectors
Nice to Have• Ability to operate in an entrepreneurial environment• Basic understanding of front-end engineering helps you design and collaborate with developers closely
Education:• Bachelor's degree in Design/Fine Arts, Psychology, Communication, Interaction Design, English, Computer Science, or related field
TECHEAD's mission is to make our on-site associates successful by placing them in the right environment so they can grow and prosper. How we treat and respond to our clients and employees is a reflection of who we are and makes us stand out from the rest. Keeping our business focused on building and maintaining relationships with our employees and clients is the key to our success. We won't strive for anything less.
TECHEAD provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training.For more information on TECHEAD please visit www.techead.com.No second parties will be accepted.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
